text: Marianna Hill ( Schwarzkopf, February 9, 1942) is a retired American actress. She was known for her roles in the Western movies El Condor and High Plains Drifter. She was also in the cult horror movie Messiah of Evil. She was married to actor Bernard Hill. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Santa Barbara, California
title: Marianna Hill
